name: exorcizing
content:

present participle of
exorcise
to force an evil spirit to leave a person or place by using prayers or magic: After the priest exorcised the spirit/house/child, apparently, the strange noises stopped.
to remove the bad effects of a frightening or upsetting event: It will take a long time to exorcise the memory of the accident.
